alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 5:44PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT STOREY...SOUTH CENTRAL WASHOE AND NORTHERN LYON COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM PDT... At 544 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stagecoach, or 8 miles east of Virginia City, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Lockwood, Derby Dam, Stagecoach, Junction U.S 50 And Six Mile Canyon-Ft Churchill Rd, Six Mile Canyon, and Nv 341 At Washoe-Storey Co Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
